mapper.select: SELECT c.CARD_ID , e.EMP_ID , e.NAME , d.DEPARTMENT_NAME , t.TEAM_NAME FROM EMP_CARD c JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON c.EMP_ID = e.EMP_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON e.DEPARTMENT_ID = d.DEPARTMENT_ID JOIN TEAM t ON e.TEAM_ID = t.TEAM_ID
